Pre-Game Insights: India is at the topmost position in the points table with a win in every match played so far
Netherlands is in a critical position as it looks to keep its standing in the World Cup 2023 points table
Pitch Report: M Chinnaswamy Stadium has the most batter-friendly pitch in India
Spinners get more assistance as the match progresses
Weather Forecast: On Sunday, there is a very low probability of rain and absolutely no likelihood of thunderstorms
Temperature in Bengaluru is expected to be around 27 degrees Celsius in daytime and around 16 degrees Celsius in the night
Squads: India squad: Rohit Sharma (Captain), Shreyas Iyer, Shubman Gill, Suryakumar Yadav, Virat Kohli, Ravichandran Ashwin, Ravindra Jadeja, Shardul Thakur, Ishan Kishan (Wicketkeeper), KL Rahul (Wicketkeeper), Jasprit Bumrah, Kuldeep Yadav, Mohammed Shami, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh Krishna

Netherlands squad: Scott Edwards (Captain, wicketkeeper), Roelof van der Merwe, Colin Ackermann, Bas de Leede, Wesley Barresi, Teja Nidamanuru, Sybrand Engelbrecht, Vikramjit Singh, Noah Croes (Wicketkeeper), Aryan Dutt, Kyle Klein, Logan van Beek, Shariz Ahmad, Saqib Zulfiqar
Key Players: Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma and Shreyas Iyer are among the batsmen to watch out for on the Indian side
Bas de Leede, Logan van Beek and Paul van Meekeren are Team Netherlands’ biggest bets in bowling
Scott Edwards and Sybrand Engelbrecht are among the ones to watch out for when it comes to batting for Netherlands
